page.title: 06EMSTREY NURSERIES
page.content: Emstrey Nurseries is a{GARDEN CENTRE owned by E.J.Bayley and Sons. a local firm of Horticulturists.The site covers 4 acres and is an example of a 'growth' industry in a time of recession.By the side of the busy A5 all items that could possibly be needed by a gardener are sold. These include:- Trees - both fruit and ornamental. Plants- bedding, vegetable and pot. Tools, Seeds, Garden Furniture. Construction materials. The business specialises in Water gardening{- Aquatics -}which is the fastest developing aspect of modern gardens.Fish, Pools, Liners, Pumps, Fountains and Rocks are all available.
